sentences.en: Collapsing interstellar cloud reverses its gravitational infall and expands outward into the relatively quiescent interstellar environment.
sentences.cn: 坍缩的星际云克服向内的引力而向外膨胀到较宁静的星际环境中去.

sentences.en: Dark matter gives out no light and is detectable only because of its gravitational effect on visible matter.
sentences.cn: 暗物质不发光，它之所以能被发现，只是因为它对可见物质产生引力作用。

sentences.en: Gravity prospecting involves the measurement of variations in the gravitational field of the earth.
sentences.cn: 重力勘探意味着测量地球重力场的变化.

sentences.en: If a spacecraft travels faster than 11 km a second, it escapes the earth's gravitational pull.
sentences.cn: 如果飞行速度超过每秒11公里，宇宙飞船将摆脱地球的引力。

sentences.en: In his monumental work begun in 1666 , Newton discovered three vital facts about the gravitational force.
sentences.cn: 牛顿在他开始于一六六六年的不朽的工作中,发现了有关万有引力的三个极其重要的事实.

sentences.en: Inertial forces and gravitational forces are indistinguishable.
sentences.cn: 惯性力与引力是不可区分的.

sentences.en: Its oscillation depends on the strength of the gravitational field.
sentences.cn: 它的振动幅度取决于引力场的强度。

sentences.en: Newton's problem was to express in mathematical terms the gravitational force between different bodies.
sentences.cn: 牛顿的目标是要用数学形式来表示不同物体之间的引力.

sentences.en: Properties of space must depend on the gravitational potential.
sentences.cn: 空间性质一定与引力势有关.

sentences.en: The criterion for gravitational contraction set by Equations 3.4 is signficantly weaker for more massive clouds.
sentences.cn: 由(3.4)式建立的引力收缩判据,对质量较大的云是很牵强的.

sentences.en: The gravitational interaction is disregarded when interactions between individual protons are considered.
sentences.cn: 在考虑单个质子间相互作用时,万有引力可以忽略不计.

sentences.en: the gravitational pull of the moon
the gravitational pull of the Moon
Under the action of universal gravitational forces the small perturbations will grow.
sentences.cn: 在万有引力的作用下,小扰动会加强.

sentences.en: We may be able to escape the black hole's gravitational field.
sentences.cn: 我们也许能逃出黑洞的引力场.

sentences.en: Weber claims recently to have observed gravitational waves coming from the centre of the galaxy.
sentences.cn: 最近,韦伯声称已观察到来自银河系中心的引力波.

words.tran_cn: 受重力作用的；万有引力的
比重计；[地物] 重力计
重力；万有引力；地心吸力
[相对][高能] 引力子；万有吸引力
重力，地心引力；严重性；庄严

phrases.tran_cn: 万有引力，地心引力；重力
重力分离；用比重不同的方法分离

trans.tran_cn: 万有引力的，重力的，地心吸力的
trans.tran_en: related to or resulting from the force of gravity
